Uses of Class
player.Robot

  • Packages that use Robot 
    Package Description
    gameInitializer
    The game initializer collects arguments from the Menu system.
    player
    The player sub system contains classes for Players and Robots, both of which have a single field which is their list of robots.

    • Uses of Robot in gameInitializer

      Fields in gameInitializer with type parameters of type Robot 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.ArrayList<Robot> GameInit.myRobots
      List of the robots

    • Uses of Robot in player

      Fields in player with type parameters of type Robot 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Robot> CPUPlayer.myRobots
      An arrayList of the Robots assigned to this CPUPlayer
      Methods in player that return Robot 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Robot CPUPlayer.getRobot(ForthString destType)
      Get the Robot of this CPU player who's Unit is the same as that specified by destType.
      Methods in player that return types with arguments of type Robot 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Robot> CPUPlayer.getRobots()
      Get this CPU PLayer's Robots.
